content: I'm still undecided between the two projects, but I'm definitely leaning towards something that will allow me to entertain friends and family more often. Since I've been spending time with my sister and brother-in-law, I've been thinking about how their property could be developed. They're planning to start a family soon, and I think a safe outdoor play area for kids would be amazing. Do you have any suggestions on how to create a kid-friendly outdoor space?
